00032 void BulletTime::Process()
00033 {
00034     NewtonParallelScene* newton = m_playManager->parallelscene.newton;
00035 
00036     if(m_active)
00037     {
00038         if(m_value > 0.0f)
00039         {
00040             m_value -= m_playManager->worldSettings.bullettimeDown;
00041             newton->SetWorldTimestep(newton->GetWorldTimestep() / m_playManager->worldSettings.bullettimeFactor);
00042         }
00043 
00044         else
00045             SetActive(false);
00046     }
00047 
00048     else
00049     {
00050         if(m_value < 1.0f)
00051             m_value += m_playManager->worldSettings.bullettimeUp;
00052     }
00053 }
00054 
00055 void BulletTime::SetActive(bool active)
00056 {
00057     this->m_active = active;
00058 
00059     if(m_value <= 0)
00060         m_active = false;
00061 
00062     if(m_active)
00063     {
00064         FMOD_Channel_SetVolume(m_playManager->map.musicChannel, 0.5);
00065 
00066         m_soundManager->Play("bullettime", m_userPlayer);
00067 
00068         m_playManager->HudBullettime(true);
00069     }
00070 
00071     else
00072     {
00073         FMOD_Channel_SetVolume(m_playManager->map.musicChannel, 1.0);
00074 
00075         m_playManager->HudBullettime(false);
00076     }
00077 }
